import React from 'react'; import {useState} from 'react'; import Logo from '../images/logo.svg'; const EditObjective = (props) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ name: "Latin has no def articles", domain: "Syntax", tags: [] }) const onChangeHandler = (event) => { setState({ ...setState, [event.target.name]:event.target.value }) } return (

Elizabeth Wilkinson

Course Creator

COURSES ELEMENTARY SPANISH 1
OBJECTIVE NAME

Objective Editor View

{state.domain}
Option 1
Option 2

Add Activity

ACTIVITY TYPE TASK TYPE DISTRACTORS BLOOM VERB
Match Translate 2 Recall EDIT
Match Translate 2 Recall EDIT
Match Translate 2 Recall EDIT
) } export default EditObjective;
